def needs_cleaning(sink:item):
    # Function to check if the sink needs cleaning based on its state
    symbol needs_cleaning=dirty(sink)
    return needs_cleaning

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select the sink to be assessed

        if not visited(sink):
            observe(sink, "Check the condition of the sink for cleaning requirements")
            # Observe the sink to determine its condition

        if needs_cleaning(sink):
            achieve dirty(sink)
            # Mark the sink as dirty if it requires cleaning

def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether the sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior identify_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        achieve visited(sink)

behavior check_sink_condition(sink:item):
    body:
        observe(sink, "Check the condition of the sink for cleaning requirements")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and close_char(char, sink) and dirty(sink)
        # Identify the sink that the character is close to
        identify_sink(sink)
        # Mark the sink as observed
        check_sink_condition(sink)
        # Check the condition of the sink for cleaning requirements
